import React from "react"; import "./WeatherForecast.css"; import axios from "axios"; export default function WeatherForecast() { function handleResponse(response) { console.log(response.data); } let longitude = -0.1275; let latitude = 51.50722; let apiKey = "667d9f573c8af4c33457be5d561a9148"; let apiUrl = `https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/onecall?lat=${latitude}&lon=${longitude}&appid=${apiKey}`; axios.get(apiUrl).then(handleResponse); return (
